ygData.subject: Re: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Amen! I felt like Pamela Anderson Lee when I got married (due to the little G-string the Helven bardess of the 3rd Chorus wear). Weddings are a fairly
ygData.messageBody:
> I did think it a realistic option that verrant might consider. Here is one
> other idea..and one dear to my heart! GET US WOMEN WEDDING DRESSES..with
> mine coming up so near I know it will be too late for me :( but a wedding
> dress instead of plate would be SO nice..sigh.....

Amen! I felt like Pamela Anderson Lee when I got married (due to the little
G-string the Helven bardess of the 3rd Chorus wear).

Weddings are a fairly important social event in Norrath, so why can't Verant put
in a few items for no purpose other then celebrations: Wedding Dresses, Wedding
cake, Champaign, & Flowers (courting RP's would love this).
